title: Start
body:
Welcome to our neighborhood! Seeing as its Halloween, why don't you bring me back candy from each house? And then we can really get this party started!
[[ Yes |Sure]] [[ no |Not a chance]]

title: Sure
body: Wow! You follow orders just like that?  This will be easy.

title: Not a chance
body: Listen up Punk, you're in my world now. Go find some candy.
